story:
44 Years in Darkness: A True Story of Madness, Tragedy, and Shattered Love

     

     The story of Rhoda Derry is one of the tragedies of mental health care in Illinois, and one of the great success stories of the Peoria State Hospital. Rhoda was born in 1834, the beautiful youngest daughter of a farming family. When she was 16, she fell in love with the son of a neighboring farm family. Charles' mother was against the marriage, and threatened to curse Rhoda if she didn't break it off with Charles. Rhoda took her seriously, and it drove her insane.

     I've written extensively about the Peoria State Hospital. My book Fractured Spirits has been well received, and it is my great privilege to share the history of this very haunted asylum with people. Rhoda Derry was one of the patients at the asylum, just one of the many people who was helped by Dr. George Zeller and his staff of compassionate nurses. But she is not a faceless statistic. She lived, and loved. I am grateful to be able to tell her story.
     And I believe her story is vitally important. We are just now getting to the point, in this country, where we can begin to have a conversation about mental illness and the hope for effective treatment. That conversation began over a century ago with Rhoda Derry.
     This book has important things to say about our treatment of the mentally ill. I write about the spirits at the haunted Peoria State Hospital, but I believe this story has the potential to go mainstream. It's not only about ghosts -- it's about a young girl whose life was changed forever by falling in love.
     Your contributions will help me bring this story to the attention of important people in the mental health community. I will use your contributions to print ARCs (advance review copies) of the book, to send to people in the field like Glenn Close, Patrick Kennedy, Kitty Dukakis, John Green, and Carrie Fisher, people who have been touched by mental illness and who have come out stronger for it. I will also send review copies to the mainstream media, to bring their attention to Rhoda's story as well. I intend to get the attention of places like NPR, The Diane Rehm Show, Smithsonian Magazine, and the Wall Street Journal.
     I plan to print review copies through Createspace. I have used this company before; I find that they provide a good product in a timely fashion. Books produced through Createspace look professionally prepared. Your contributions will fund printing of review copies, as well as the postage needed to send those copies to influencers all over the media.
     And in return for your financial support, I have put together lots of great perks, from magnets, to advance copies of the book that you'll receive two months before it hits bookstore shelves, to the opportunity to explore the haunted Pollak Hospital with me as your personal guide. This is my way of saying "thank you" for helping me bring Rhoda Derry's story to the world.
     Mental illness touches many people. This was as true in the nineteenth century as it is today. This book will bring history alive. It also has an intensely personal angle to it; in the book, I describe the struggle of someone close to me. Her story and Rhoda's have parallels, although the ending to each story is very different.
     And even if you can't contribute financially, there are other ways you can help. Please feel free to share this campaign. I'm active on Facebook, so that's where we can both share the heck out of this endeavor. Or visit me at www.sylviashults.wordpress.com. I welcome your feedback, and I look forward to your visit,

     And in return for your financial support, I have put together lots of great perks, from magnets, to advance copies of the book that you'll receive two months before it hits bookstore shelves, to the opportunity to explore the haunted Pollak Hospital with me as your personal guide. This is my way of saying "thank you" for helping me bring Rhoda Derry's story to the world.
     Mental illness touches many people. This was as true in the nineteenth century as it is today. This book will bring history alive. It also has an intensely personal angle to it; in the book, I describe the struggle of someone close to me. Her story and Rhoda's have parallels, although the ending to each story is very different.
     And even if you can't contribute financially, there are other ways you can help. Please feel free to share this campaign. I'm active on Facebook, so that's where we can both share the heck out of this endeavor. Or visit me at www.sylviashults.wordpress.com. I welcome your feedback, and I look forward to your visit,

story:
Thank you for visiting this page.

Project Overview

This project is the first published edition of the Lylye of Medicynes, which is the only known Middle English translation of Bernard of Gordon’s Latin Lilium Medicinae (1305). Bernard of Gordon was a physician and lecturer in the medieval medical school of Montpellier. The text of the Lylye is contained in one fifteenth-century manuscript (Oxford Bodleian Library MS. Ashmole 1505). Currently, there are no editions or comprehensive studies of this text.

The Publication

Over the past three years, during my successful study as a PhD student at the University of Nottingham, I have transcribed and edited the 245 folios of the manuscript and written an introduction, provenance (journal article forthcoming – autumn 2016), a case study of medieval medical ingredients (journal article forthcoming – autumn 2016), commentary, critical apparatus, and materia medica. The resulting word-processed edition is 665 pages. This project is in the final stages of completion after three years of dedicated effort. The publisher has requested an expanded commentary and a full glossary, as this will be the first ever edition of this text. This will involve a significant investment of time. Preparation of the final draft for submission to the publisher will be accomplished from March to July 2016 (based in the UK - Nottingham and Oxford).

Outcome

The primary outcome of this funding will be the first edition of the Lylye of Medicynes, which will enable access to this important text for a wide range of researchers, including linguists, Middle English and medieval Latin specialists, history of medicine scholars, and scientists interested in medieval recipes. This publication is connected with the novel research into the efficacy of medieval ingredients to combat infectious disease, which holds great promise for the development of new methods to fight antibiotic-resistant microbes.

This text contains thousands of medicinal ingredients, including 360 specific recipes. Two of the Lylye’s recipes are currently being tested by the AncientBiotics team and preliminary data shows encouraging results.

For more about the AncientBiotics team see:

Video of the AncientBiotics Project

Harrison, Freya, Roberts, A. E. L., Gabrilska, R., Rumbaugh, K. P., Lee, Christina, and Diggle, S. P., ‘A 1,000-year-old antimicrobial remedy with antistaphylococcal activity,' mBio 6.4 (2015)

Academic Qualifications

PhD English, MA Medieval English, BS Biology

This funding bid is submitted independently of any institutional affiliation.

Thank you for your contribution to this work.

story:
Short Summary

  • Hello! My name is Jessica!
  • I have been writing since I was 10 years old and rabbits are passion of mine; I own a Mini Lop named Bun Bun that I rescued from my local animal shelter. Marbles' Guide To Bunnies will make my fourth book to be published - the first with beautifully done illustrations.
  • Marbles is very near and dear to my heart - as the title implies, this book follows Marbles as he talks about what its like to be a member of the bunny world. He talks about the dos and donts of owning a bunny as well as likes and dislikes that every bunny has.
  • This children's book has a unique opportunity to become a lovely, heartfelt keepsake for children and adults everywhere! The illustrations are in a black and white style that stand out on their own but they also give the reader a chance to personalize this book - it has a 'color-it-yourself' option.
  • This campaign is to help pay for the black and white illustrations, promotion of Marbles' Guide To Bunnies, and future book-signings.

What I Need & What You Get

  • To make this dream a reality I need at least $500.
  • Here's the breakdown so that you know where your money is going: 
  • $200 goes to my illustrator as payment for all of the illustrations, including the cover art. There are over 20 pictures in this book. 
  • $100 goes to promoting Marbles; ie: Newspaper, Facebook, Twitter, book stores, radio, postcards, business cards, bookmarks, stickers, postage, etc. 
  • $200 goes to helping set up book signings at my local animal shelters (half the proceeds earned at these will go to helping the shelter, library, and books stores; ie: gas money, posters, promotion, buying copies of Marbles Guide to Bunnies (sadly even as the author I can't get free copies), bookmarks, t-shirts, etc.           
  • The rest, $100, will go towards helping produce and ship your perks!
  • The perks will include 'Thank You' postcards, copies of Marbles (both signed and unsigned), bunny-fied t-shirts, posters, and more!
  • If I can't reach my goal of $600 then the funds I do earn will still be going to paying for the illustrations and promotion of Marbles as well as fulfilling my promise of perks.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know that money can be tight but you can still help!

  • Spread the word! (Word of mouth is still the fastest way for news to travel.)
  • Share the link of this campaign with family and friends!

story:
Who We Are

Pink Elephant International is a non-profit, for-purpose organization dedicated to connecting teachers on a global scale to share knowledge and resources with one another, with an emphasis on empowering teachers and students in impoverished communities, to increase student access to quality education. We have created an online portal program that connects teachers in the United States and abroad to those in our partner schools in Kenya. We currently have four schools in various areas of Kenya (Nakuru, Kisumu, and Pokot) that we work in conjunction with to provide access to quality instructional resources. This support is made available in the form of lesson plans, activity ideas, printable and interactive materials, and visual aids for their classroom in order to boost teaching confidence and skills to, in turn, raise the standard of education. 

We are also a part of a community outreach program in Nakuru connecting various therapists (occupational therapists, physical therapists, and special educators) to build a library of resources on our portal that they may use in home visits with parents and children of varying special needs.

In addition to the resource library, our virtual portal also features two new initiatives that are in the initial stages of development. The first is an online discussion forum we refer to as the Global Teachers Lounge. Here, teachers who have access to the portal, both in Kenya and abroad, can interact in the form of a “chat room” to ask questions, share experiences, and discuss techniques, in an effort to help each other from either side. Second, we are also developing a professional development library. This library will provide professional development opportunities in the form of instructional video trainings and “how to” videos. In a country where there is a lack of professional development for educators and those interested, we want to contribute to teacher development with the network we already have in place.

Our Mission

To create a global support system that provides partner teachers with access to shared lesson plans, resource support, and collaboration with other educators and professionals in the US and abroad. We value the importance of team work, commitment, and a positive attitude in expanding the world of education for our partner teachers, with the great minds that make up this field through teacher empowerment.

Why A Book?

At Pink Elephant International our goal is to create a large-scale network of teachers who are as excited about education and helping their students as we are. To develop a successful teacher, one needs a passionate teacher. We believe everyone has a story about their favorite teacher and how much he/she meant to them; someone who believed in them; children who have stories about struggles to stay in school and what an education means to them; and the daily lengths both teacher and students, especially in impoverished communities, go through in order to get the one thing no one can ever take away from them: education. Pink Elephant International wants to tell these stories. We want to bring to life the stories of teachers and students around the world and share with you what education looks like to them.

Pink Elephant International will seek to answer some of the following questions in the teachers and students who participate:

  • What does education mean to you?
  • What does education mean for your future?
  • What challenges have you faced in education? Sacrifices you have made?
  • What are your hopes and dreams for your future?
  • How do you think your country views education? Is it a priority?

We need your help. In order to bring these stories directly to you we need help raising money to get this project off the ground. Below is a breakdown of the costs from the amount we are looking to raise. Please help us bring these stories to life and also become a valued supporter of our partner schools across Kenya.

To find out how to get more involved with Pink Elephant International, become a supporting teacher, or just get more information about us visit our website at www.PEinternational.org.

What Will The Funds Go To?

  • $10,250 travel expenses for two Co-Executive Directors collect stories from our partners in various countries (inclusive of airfare and visa's)
  • $2,250 self-publishing expenses (inclusive of self-publishing fee, cover design fee, creating and ebook version, and editor/proof reader fee)
  • $2,500 color printing expenses

**All funds will be going to these three things only. Any other donors who wish to donate to Pink Elephant International directly can visit our website (www.PEinternational.org). Also, if you are a donor and would like receipt proof of your donation please feel free to contact either Co-Executive Director Lauren Vining (lauren@peinternational.org) OR Devon Legare (devon@peinternational.org).

story:
Project Goal.

To publish a two-part book series, that will- 

1). Demonstrate the ancient roots of Sūrya Namaskāra & Vinyāsa-Based Postural Yoga

2). Reveal lost Shakti-based practices critical to Vinyāsa Yoga

3). Revive many Āsana-based sequences previously unknown to the West

 

This  two-volume series will be the first to present the roots and evolution of Yoga Vinyāsa, including Surya Namaskara as an ancient practice that spans 1,000+ years of uncharted territory in the history of Yoga.

Experience the Flow of Shakti in Your Yoga Practice Like Never Before.

By contributing to this campaign, you'll help me to reveal the ancient heritage and lost practices of  Vinyāsa-based Yoga now engaged by millions worldwide.

 

My Background.

I am a Yoga practitioner, Sanskrit Scholar and PhD Candidate with advanced degrees from Harvard and Berkeley in Sanskrit and Religion. I have shared the teachings of Yoga and Tantric Shaivism with thousands of people across the globe.

Through nine years of research into hundreds of unpublished Tantric texts, I have discovered numerous passages which detail the ancient practice of Namaskāra-based postural Yoga, including the development of many Shakti-based Āsana  practices which evolved from it. 

 In 2014, I began to preview my findings through online courses co-taught with Shiva Rea, including ‘The History and Evolution of Yoga Vinyāsa’,  ‘The Tantric Origins of Modern Yoga' and most recently, 'Chandra Namaskār: The Roots and Evolution.'

 

Be a Part of the Shakti Revival. 

Experience the Liberating Power of the Divine Feminine in Yoga Practice.

My book series will be the first to present the roots and evolution of Sūrya Namaskāra and Vinyāsa Yoga as a Shakti-based, mantra-led practice, through passages discovered in 100+ medieval Tantric sources. These sources preceded the patriarchal 'Hatha Yoga' texts known to the West – texts which eliminated the Namaskāra and Āsana-based sequencing original to Tantric Yoga.

By supporting this campaign, you will directly impact the revival of forgotten Vinyāsa Yoga practices which comprised an empowering ritual of embodied movement meditation that honors the Divine Feminine, as originally conceived in the Tantras.

“The Namaskāra practice is a continually moving flow which immerses the practitioner in a pervading flood of divine contentment. It is best performed after reciting of 108 Self-Empowering Names of the Goddess. The Namaskara practice manifests within Oneself the Love which sustains all Life."  - Pūrṇānanda, from his Tattva Cintāmaṇi​ (16th century)

These books will furthermore  reveal the fundamental role of improvisational *dance* within the Sequencing of Surya Namaskāra, as taught in the Tantras -  

“O Goddess, through this flowing Namaskāra practice, one experiences a Dance. Performed regularly, the highest Beloved will manifest....through which She who Personifies the Force (Shakti) of liberation rises forth. She is one’s very own, intimate power, arising from within one’s Self.  Now hear about the method of our practice....” - Sarvollāsa Tantra (ca. 1400 A.D.)

An overview of Tantric texts to be featured in my books, all of which containing previously un-documented passages of this Shakti-based Vinyāsa Yoga practice, may be found in my 'Namaskāra Timeline' video (below), which begins to fill in the awkward, thousand year gap that appears in most historical timelines of the Yoga tradition - 

Watch:'Sūrya Namaskāra Timeline' - a 1000+ year evolution, by C. Tompkins

 
 

What to Expect in these Books.

A. Sūrya Namaskāra demonstrated as an Ancient Yoga Practice.

My first book will prove that Sūrya Namaskāra was always considered a core practice of the Tantric Yoga tradition. Drawing from numerous, overlooked Tantric sources, I will show the place and role of Vinyāsa-based Yoga as one of the preliminary ‘rites’ of daily Tantric Yoga practice. 

B. A Detailed Study of Three Daily Namaskāra Yoga Practices 

My books will reveal Namaskāra-based Vinyāsa Yoga as it was originally  performed - as a practice imbued with the Divine Feminine, expressed in sonic form as the Shakti ('Power') of  Mantras, which led  each sequence - 

I'll show that these 3 practices were universally prescribed from about 1000 AD forward, and were prescribed in sources representing at least 6 Tantric lineages:

#1. 'Classic' Sūrya Namaskāra ~ performed at the Dawn Juncture (Sandhyā)~ Sequence of 12 poses led by the transformative power of Shakti, in the form of the seed mantras HRAM, HRIM, HRUM, HRAIM, HRAUM, and HRAH.

#2. Namaskāra as the 'Fierce Practice' ~ Noon Juncture (Sandhyā)~ 16 Poses following the Syllables of a Vedic or Tantric Verse, sounds which represented the embodied (sonic) flow of the Divine Feminine which empowered and transformed one's physical and subtle bodies through engaged movement.

#3.  Chandra Namaskāra (Lunar Prostration Sequence)  ~ Dusk Juncture (Sandhyā) ~ 7 to 64 possible postures ~ this sequence would inspire countless Āsana-based sub-routines of Vinyāsa Yoga, which have come down to us today; several of these will be featured in Part II of this book series

My books will also reveal - 

  •  Pranayama (breath extension) techniques since lost to us, as originally  choreographed with  Namaskāra-based postural sequencing
  • Chakra Vinyāsa - How the shapes of the Chakras became Embodied Postures in the original sequence ofChandra Namaskāra
  • The Role of Mudrā Vinyāsa as Dance  in Namaskāra Practice and how  improvisational (sahaja) movement  originally defined Vinyāsa Based Yoga 

Video Below - Evidence for the Ancient roots of Vinyāsa-based Namaskāra practice 

 

C. Niyamāsana - Tantric Renovation of the '8 Limbs' of the Yogasūtra as Embodied Practice.

My books will teach the extraordinary place and relevance of the Yogasūtra to Āsana Based Vinyāsa Yoga, and will  thus finally explain why Krishnamacharya and his students, such as Pattabhis Jois (Ashtanga Yoga) held such reverence for the '8 Limbs' of Patañjali's practice - 

 For the first time*,  I will show that how the Vishnu-based Tantras incorporated Patanjali’s 8 Limbs (Ashtanga) into a fully embodied practice which embraced dynamic movement as a central part of daily sādhana, called Haṭha Yoga. 

“…Āsana is understood to be an obligatory observance (niyamāsana) in the (Tantric) teaching. In this case (vs. the Yogasūtra), the purpose of Āsana is to reverse the negative effect of bodily weakness through exertion applied to one’s own [body].”  -Tattvavaiśāradi of Vacaspati, late 10th century 

Image: Representation of Warrior sequence from Nepalese manuscript, date unknown

 

D. The Rise of Āsana Vinyāsa: Source Texts of T. Krishnamacharya’s Mysore Yoga Revival. 

Volume II  will trace the 1000-year evolution of Āsana-based Vinyasa Yoga from its Sūrya Namaskāra roots, revealing the premodern sources for more than 65% of the Āsana practices revived by Krishnamacharya and the Mysore school.This will include more than 200 Āsanas, most of which are known and practiced today, in the original sequences in which they appeared and were taught in Krishnamacharya's sources (listed in the preface to his 1934 book, the Yoga Makaranda).

D. Comprehensive Index of All Sūrya Namaskāra Passages to be included in these Books.

 Volume I will include a comprehensive index of over six dozen previously unpublished Sūrya Namaskāra passages, spanning 1000 years of the Yoga tradition, in order to encourage future scholarship on the ancient Tantric heritage of modern Vinyāsa-based yoga. See my 'Namaskāra Timeline' video above to peruse Tantric sources to featured in my books.

 

Timing & Importance of this Work

What is the Historical Lineage of Embodied Yoga Practices?

“Surya Kriya (i.e. Namaskāra) is of great antiquity… it is a breathing sequence which accompanies the physical postures. It develops mental clarity and focus, and removes weakness in the body” -Swami Sadhguru, spokesperson for the U.N.’s  ‘Haṭha Yoga’ Program.

“The emergence of postural yoga that we take for granted in modern yoga…such as the Sun Salutation or Surya Namaskar are neither millennia-old nor rooted in ancient texts but a relatively recent vintage.” –Mark Singleton, the Yoga Body

What is the true history and heritage of Hatha Yoga? The majority of Yoga practitioners in the world today identify Hatha Yoga with a postural practice, often Vinyāsa-based. But Western scholarship impacting the Yoga world claims that this Yoga, including Sūrya Namskāra, was fabricated by Krishnamacharya and others in the early 20th century. The argument contends that Surya Namaskar is a modern invention with main influences from Western gymnastics, body building, and wrestling,

In 2014, India petitioned the United Nations to establish an International Day of Yoga to celebrate the practice of Yoga as India’s "invaluable gift to the world." The petition received overwhelming support from 175 nations; the summer solstice was declared the ‘International Day of Yoga.’ In 2015 and 2016, the Vinyāsa-based style of postural yoga, practiced by millions worldwide today, was officially praised as the ‘Ancient Heritage of India’ by the United Nations.

Sūrya Namaskāra: Ancient or Modern?

For the first time ever, my book will provide evidence that Sūrya Namaskāra and Vinyāsa-based Yoga were the foundations of Haṭha Yoga as originally conceived in the medieval Tantric tradition, prior to the arrival of the post-Tantric Hatha Yoga manuals, such as the Hathapradīpikā. 

For more information, please  see my recent article, "Sūrya Namaskāra: Ancient Practice or Modern Invention? The Controversy and the Textual Evidence."  

 

Where Your Money Will Go.

Your timely contribution will enable me to complete the great work of translating crucial Sanskrit passages discovered in my many years of research, plus editing, collating, and contextualizing these passages for organization in the book. Part of your donation will support the publishing process itself, including final editing, professional illustrations, formatting, design and marketing expenses.

In exchange for your support, I have put together a range of exciting perks (gifts), including downloadable and live courses from Shiva Rea, Sianna Sherman, Sally Kempton and myself. You can also pre-order this groundbreaking book at a very low price (see right panel of this page)!

Proven Fundraiser Track Record.

I've had repeated success meeting the goals of crowd-sourced efforts to illuminate ancient Yoga teachings within the modern world. In March of 2012, I founded the Tantric (Shaiva) Manuscript Acquisition Project (TMAP), which funded a trip to retrieve sacred manuscripts from Kashmir before they were lost forever. I returned in May 2012 with over 25,000 scanned pages of unpublished manuscripts. In 2014, I led a successful INDIEGOGO campaign to fund an edition and translation of  the '1000 Names of Sharada' (matron Goddess of Kashmir). It is now accessible to all online (please click here).

Impact of this Work

Tell your friends, local studios and fellow yogis about this important endeavor! Share us on social media!

Contribute to this campaign and join me at the ground level of rediscovery, revealing to the world the truly ancient heritage of modern Vinyāsa-based Yoga, practiced by tens of millions of people today.

Chris in the Press!

"Sūrya Namaskāra: Ancient Practice or Modern Invention? Controversy, Textual Evidence" (November 2016 - 'hot off the press'!)

"What are the True Origins of Modern Yoga?" A Sivana Podcast Interview with C. Tompkins, October 4th 2016 ~ "Join us as we talk with yogi and scholar Christopher Tompkins about his research into the true origins of modern postural yoga. story_txt:
Project Goal.
To publish a two-part book series, that will- 
1). Demonstrate the ancient roots of Sūrya Namaskāra & Vinyāsa-Based Postural Yoga
2). Reveal lost Shakti-based practices critical to Vinyāsa Yoga
3). Revive many Āsana-based sequences previously unknown to the West
 
This  two-volume series will be the first to present the roots and evolution of Yoga Vinyāsa, including Surya Namaskara as an ancient practice that spans 1,000+ years of uncharted territory in the history of Yoga.
Experience the Flow of Shakti in Your Yoga Practice Like Never Before.
By contributing to this campaign, you'll help me to reveal the ancient heritage and lost practices of  Vinyāsa-based Yoga now engaged by millions worldwide.
 
My Background.

I am a Yoga practitioner, Sanskrit Scholar and PhD Candidate with advanced degrees from Harvard and Berkeley in Sanskrit and Religion. I have shared the teachings of Yoga and Tantric Shaivism with thousands of people across the globe.
Through nine years of research into hundreds of unpublished Tantric texts, I have discovered numerous passages which detail the ancient practice of Namaskāra-based postural Yoga, including the development of many Shakti-based Āsana  practices which evolved from it. 
 In 2014, I began to preview my findings through online courses co-taught with Shiva Rea, including ‘The History and Evolution of Yoga Vinyāsa’,  ‘The Tantric Origins of Modern Yoga' and most recently, 'Chandra Namaskār: The Roots and Evolution.'

 
Be a Part of the Shakti Revival. 
Experience the Liberating Power of the Divine Feminine in Yoga Practice.

My book series will be the first to present the roots and evolution of Sūrya Namaskāra and Vinyāsa Yoga as a Shakti-based, mantra-led practice, through passages discovered in 100+ medieval Tantric sources. These sources preceded the patriarchal 'Hatha Yoga' texts known to the West – texts which eliminated the Namaskāra and Āsana-based sequencing original to Tantric Yoga.
By supporting this campaign, you will directly impact the revival of forgotten Vinyāsa Yoga practices which comprised an empowering ritual of embodied movement meditation that honors the Divine Feminine, as originally conceived in the Tantras.
“The Namaskāra practice is a continually moving flow which immerses the practitioner in a pervading flood of divine contentment. It is best performed after reciting of 108 Self-Empowering Names of the Goddess. The Namaskara practice manifests within Oneself the Love which sustains all Life."  - Pūrṇānanda, from his Tattva Cintāmaṇi​ (16th century)
These books will furthermore  reveal the fundamental role of improvisational *dance* within the Sequencing of Surya Namaskāra, as taught in the Tantras -  
“O Goddess, through this flowing Namaskāra practice, one experiences a Dance. Performed regularly, the highest Beloved will manifest....through which She who Personifies the Force (Shakti) of liberation rises forth. She is one’s very own, intimate power, arising from within one’s Self.  Now hear about the method of our practice....” - Sarvollāsa Tantra (ca. 1400 A.D.)
An overview of Tantric texts to be featured in my books, all of which containing previously un-documented passages of this Shakti-based Vinyāsa Yoga practice, may be found in my 'Namaskāra Timeline' video (below), which begins to fill in the awkward, thousand year gap that appears in most historical timelines of the Yoga tradition - 
Watch:'Sūrya Namaskāra Timeline' - a 1000+ year evolution, by C. Tompkins


 
 

What to Expect in these Books.
A. Sūrya Namaskāra demonstrated as an Ancient Yoga Practice.
My first book will prove that Sūrya Namaskāra was always considered a core practice of the Tantric Yoga tradition. Drawing from numerous, overlooked Tantric sources, I will show the place and role of Vinyāsa-based Yoga as one of the preliminary ‘rites’ of daily Tantric Yoga practice. 
B. A Detailed Study of Three Daily Namaskāra Yoga Practices 
My books will reveal Namaskāra-based Vinyāsa Yoga as it was originally  performed - as a practice imbued with the Divine Feminine, expressed in sonic form as the Shakti ('Power') of  Mantras, which led  each sequence - 
I'll show that these 3 practices were universally prescribed from about 1000 AD forward, and were prescribed in sources representing at least 6 Tantric lineages:
#1. 'Classic' Sūrya Namaskāra ~ performed at the Dawn Juncture (Sandhyā)~ Sequence of 12 poses led by the transformative power of Shakti, in the form of the seed mantras HRAM, HRIM, HRUM, HRAIM, HRAUM, and HRAH.
#2. Namaskāra as the 'Fierce Practice' ~ Noon Juncture (Sandhyā)~ 16 Poses following the Syllables of a Vedic or Tantric Verse, sounds which represented the embodied (sonic) flow of the Divine Feminine which empowered and transformed one's physical and subtle bodies through engaged movement.
#3.  Chandra Namaskāra (Lunar Prostration Sequence)  ~ Dusk Juncture (Sandhyā) ~ 7 to 64 possible postures ~ this sequence would inspire countless Āsana-based sub-routines of Vinyāsa Yoga, which have come down to us today; several of these will be featured in Part II of this book series
My books will also reveal - 


 Pranayama (breath extension) techniques since lost to us, as originally  choreographed with  Namaskāra-based postural sequencing

Chakra Vinyāsa - How the shapes of the Chakras became Embodied Postures in the original sequence ofChandra Namaskāra


The Role of Mudrā Vinyāsa as Dance  in Namaskāra Practice and how  improvisational (sahaja) movement  originally defined Vinyāsa Based Yoga 

Video Below - Evidence for the Ancient roots of Vinyāsa-based Namaskāra practice 

 
C. Niyamāsana - Tantric Renovation of the '8 Limbs' of the Yogasūtra as Embodied Practice.
My books will teach the extraordinary place and relevance of the Yogasūtra to Āsana Based Vinyāsa Yoga, and will  thus finally explain why Krishnamacharya and his students, such as Pattabhis Jois (Ashtanga Yoga) held such reverence for the '8 Limbs' of Patañjali's practice - 
 For the first time*,  I will show that how the Vishnu-based Tantras incorporated Patanjali’s 8 Limbs (Ashtanga) into a fully embodied practice which embraced dynamic movement as a central part of daily sādhana, called Haṭha Yoga. 
“…Āsana is understood to be an obligatory observance (niyamāsana) in the (Tantric) teaching. In this case (vs. the Yogasūtra), the purpose of Āsana is to reverse the negative effect of bodily weakness through exertion applied to one’s own [body].”  -Tattvavaiśāradi of Vacaspati, late 10th century 

Image: Representation of Warrior sequence from Nepalese manuscript, date unknown
 
D. The Rise of Āsana Vinyāsa: Source Texts of T. Krishnamacharya’s Mysore Yoga Revival. 
Volume II  will trace the 1000-year evolution of Āsana-based Vinyasa Yoga from its Sūrya Namaskāra roots, revealing the premodern sources for more than 65% of the Āsana practices revived by Krishnamacharya and the Mysore school.This will include more than 200 Āsanas, most of which are known and practiced today, in the original sequences in which they appeared and were taught in Krishnamacharya's sources (listed in the preface to his 1934 book, the Yoga Makaranda).
D. Comprehensive Index of All Sūrya Namaskāra Passages to be included in these Books.
 Volume I will include a comprehensive index of over six dozen previously unpublished Sūrya Namaskāra passages, spanning 1000 years of the Yoga tradition, in order to encourage future scholarship on the ancient Tantric heritage of modern Vinyāsa-based yoga. See my 'Namaskāra Timeline' video above to peruse Tantric sources to featured in my books.

 

Timing & Importance of this Work

What is the Historical Lineage of Embodied Yoga Practices?
“Surya Kriya (i.e. Namaskāra) is of great antiquity… it is a breathing sequence which accompanies the physical postures. It develops mental clarity and focus, and removes weakness in the body” -Swami Sadhguru, spokesperson for the U.N.’s  ‘Haṭha Yoga’ Program.
“The emergence of postural yoga that we take for granted in modern yoga…such as the Sun Salutation or Surya Namaskar are neither millennia-old nor rooted in ancient texts but a relatively recent vintage.” –Mark Singleton, the Yoga Body
What is the true history and heritage of Hatha Yoga? The majority of Yoga practitioners in the world today identify Hatha Yoga with a postural practice, often Vinyāsa-based. But Western scholarship impacting the Yoga world claims that this Yoga, including Sūrya Namskāra, was fabricated by Krishnamacharya and others in the early 20th century. The argument contends that Surya Namaskar is a modern invention with main influences from Western gymnastics, body building, and wrestling,
In 2014, India petitioned the United Nations to establish an International Day of Yoga to celebrate the practice of Yoga as India’s "invaluable gift to the world." The petition received overwhelming support from 175 nations; the summer solstice was declared the ‘International Day of Yoga.’ In 2015 and 2016, the Vinyāsa-based style of postural yoga, practiced by millions worldwide today, was officially praised as the ‘Ancient Heritage of India’ by the United Nations.

Sūrya Namaskāra: Ancient or Modern?

For the first time ever, my book will provide evidence that Sūrya Namaskāra and Vinyāsa-based Yoga were the foundations of Haṭha Yoga as originally conceived in the medieval Tantric tradition, prior to the arrival of the post-Tantric Hatha Yoga manuals, such as the Hathapradīpikā. 
For more information, please  see my recent article, "Sūrya Namaskāra: Ancient Practice or Modern Invention? The Controversy and the Textual Evidence."  


 


Where Your Money Will Go.
Your timely contribution will enable me to complete the great work of translating crucial Sanskrit passages discovered in my many years of research, plus editing, collating, and contextualizing these passages for organization in the book. Part of your donation will support the publishing process itself, including final editing, professional illustrations, formatting, design and marketing expenses.
In exchange for your support, I have put together a range of exciting perks (gifts), including downloadable and live courses from Shiva Rea, Sianna Sherman, Sally Kempton and myself. You can also pre-order this groundbreaking book at a very low price (see right panel of this page)!

Proven Fundraiser Track Record.
I've had repeated success meeting the goals of crowd-sourced efforts to illuminate ancient Yoga teachings within the modern world. In March of 2012, I founded the Tantric (Shaiva) Manuscript Acquisition Project (TMAP), which funded a trip to retrieve sacred manuscripts from Kashmir before they were lost forever. I returned in May 2012 with over 25,000 scanned pages of unpublished manuscripts. In 2014, I led a successful INDIEGOGO campaign to fund an edition and translation of  the '1000 Names of Sharada' (matron Goddess of Kashmir). It is now accessible to all online (please click here).
Impact of this Work
Tell your friends, local studios and fellow yogis about this important endeavor! Share us on social media!
Contribute to this campaign and join me at the ground level of rediscovery, revealing to the world the truly ancient heritage of modern Vinyāsa-based Yoga, practiced by tens of millions of people today.


Chris in the Press!

story:
Eating As A Spiritual Practice tells my story of how I discovered food to be at the core of my family's health, and subsequently at the core of our environmental problems.

My name is Susan Campbell, author of the Healthy School Lunch Action Guide and nutritional and agricultural advocate.  After several years of working in our nation's schools and lecturing across the country, I took my advocacy into the kitchen and began teaching the best of all diets: Raw, Cooked & Cultured (fermented).

This book is written as a memoir because a story often paints a more vivid picture than pages of science, facts and footnotes.  Eating also contains the recipes from my internationally distributed DVD series called, "Essential Cuisine."

Our food system lies at the core of most of our health, environment, and even social problems. My hope is to inspire, enlighten and educate people so they align with their source, the Earth, and their plate to live healthy lives on a healthy Earth.

If you would like to find out more about my work, please check out my website HERE.

story:
Short Summary

The Drunken Odyssey with John King is a weekly podcast about the writing life. Since June of 2012,  I’ve released a new episode ranging from about an hour to 2 hours, with the occasional epic-length podcast. All 272+ episodes are free to download.
 

I’ve interviewed many famous writers on this show, including David Sedaris, Cheryl Strayed, Chuck Klosterman, John Waters, Nikki Giovanni, Rick Moody, Tony Hoagland, Greg Proops, Sharon Olds, Irvine Welsh, Martin Amis, Walter Mosley, and many, many others. Besides interviewing writers, I bring in other writers for roundtable discussions related to literature, as well as respond to listener mail with David James Poissant and review books about the craft of writing with Vanessa Blakeslee.

The experience of putting on and releasing this show has been an extraordinary pleasure for me, but I do need some help making the show sustainable in the future. There are regular expenses of producing the show, travel expenses, and upgrades that would really help The Drunken Odyssey be able to keep releasing great content. I am asking m y listeners, new and old, to donate to the show towards these goals.

What We Need & What You Get

This year, I’m trying to raise $1,500. Any progress toward this ultimate goal will help us to achieve a number of incremental goals:

  • Administrative costs: hosting on Wordpress and file hosting on Libsyn.
  • Equipment upgrades: TDO really needs more microphones, digital recorders, and a good camera to build up our youtube content.
  • Travel: Miami Book Fair International is a significant cost, despite how frugal your podcast host tends to be. The AWP Conference in Tampa will also incur costs to the show.
  • Any cash left over will be saved towards future administrative costs. 

The perks are fab! 

If I reach my goal of $1,500, I'll record a bonus episode for donors.

The Impact

The Drunken Odyssey offers a great value to the literary community. Its interviews are remarkable. The breadth of its scope is impressive; where else can you listen to novelists, short story writers, poets, journalists, screenwriters, scholars, and artists discuss their process and life’s work? Plus, it’s like an uncensored NPR, so the host and guests can curse when necessary, or admit when the world happens to be fucking far from a civilized place. We also do public readings, and produce the Litlando Conference each year.

I have managed to keep up the high quality of the show with a very limited budget, but will need a little help to sustain and improve upon the quality of the work I have been doing.

Risks & Challenges

The main risk of my podcast, as I see it, is stagnation. I don’t want the show to seem like an exercise asking the same questions and fielding a predictable range of answers. I happen to be fiercely curious, hence my unwillingness to limit the show to a genre. I have genuinely enjoyed every interview, whether the writer is experiencing her first book publication, or the author was an inaugural poet, like Richard Blanco. But I do want to keep exploring with this show, and to keep expanding the media it produces. Later this fall, TDO should be releasing its first web series.

The challenge is expanding without losing the high quality you’ve come to expect on the show. Generally speaking, TDO sounds great. The interviews sound sharp, and are memorable. If the economics of running the show were taken care of for the next year, which $1,500 would take care of, then I should be able to focus on these new adventures.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can spread the word of this campaign.

You can spread the word of this campaign: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-drunken-odyssey-podcast-fundraiser-2017

You can review the show on iTunes.

You can like us on facebook.

Thank you for helping me keep up the good work!

story:
We are Jay Tinsiano and Jay Newton.

Jay Tinsiano has been writing and publishing the Frank Bowen conspiracy fiction series since 2012. Jay Newton joined forces in 2013 to help expand the Bowen fictional world and plan the Dark Paradigm series.

The Dark Paradigm series outlines the epic struggle between the occult driven cabal that control the global power elite and a determined activist organisation called Liberatus.

An initial four books will set the scene as the cabal attempt to implement their Four Horse operations in a bid to bring about an apocalyptic D-day through the eyes of the main protagonists; all bearing their own demons and internal battles.

This campaign is all about raising the funds to launch this series. We sincerely believe Dark Paradigm will become a major success. In order to give the books the highest quality service for editing, cover jacket designs and the imprint launch we have decided to create a valuable funding proposition exclusively on IndieGoGo.

We've calculated an average cost of 2k per book in the series, hence the 8k total.

We have some exciting perks including the Frank Bowen library of existing books, signed paperbacks, an advance on the Dark Paradigm and Dark Ops series with opportunities to get your name inside the books.

We are also offering to critique your own stories and even ghost write you an exclusive story that you can name and publish as your own

If we fail to raise the required amounts we will put any funds towards the production of the first books such as editing and cover design.

Your contribution will help us launch not just a series but a book imprint that we hope will become a hub for fans of thrillers, post-apocalyptic and sci-fi books.

When it comes to risks for completion of this projects, there are very few. We have a track record of finishing and publishing books. In fact the only way this series won’t be completed is if we are targeted in a stealth covert operation by global intelligence agencies.

Please remember if you are unable to contribute financially you can still help the campaign by giving this page a shout out using the Indiegogo share tools.

Thanks so much for your time.

Jay Tinsiano and Jay Newton

We will get them sent out you within two weeks! 

We can't for you to receive them and start using them!

 

♡Welcome to Hello Hachiko ♡

Hello Hachiko is all about bringing a little happiness to everyday life! Our dream is to create stationery which makes you smile every time you need to write something down. Our designs are bright and cheerful just like our little muse, Hachiko. We hope that our products provide you with a daily dose of happiness each time you use them.

We spent months coming up with designs & searching for the right supplier. After a vigorous selection process, we have finally settled on a supplier and we are super excited to present Hello Hachiko to you!

We hope that you would lend us your support in making Hello Hachiko a reality so that we can create stationery which will brighten up your day and bring positivity to those around you!

Click on "GET THIS PERK!" To get your perks today!

Or click "Back IT" to Donate to support our dream!

Sizzling Summer Collection
Exclusively launching on Indiegogo 

 

POPPIN' POPSICLES

 

BOB THE BEAR

 

DELIGHTFUL DINOSAURS

 

Limited Edition INDIEGOGO Perks!

 

Because we absolutely adore you, we want to give you extra bonuses with the perks you get!
We have put a "Gift with purchase" beside the bonus items you will get with each tier.

 

Early Bird

 

In Demand

 

Indiegogo Special

 

Family Pack

How much is postage?

For backers outside Singapore, we have chosen to use surface mail to send your lovely perks to you. Although this route will take slightly longer to reach you and does not give the option of tracking, it is definitely more economical.

If you wish to receive your package via air mail (additional charges will apply, tracking available) please do not hesitate to contact us to arrange!

For our Singapore backers, we will be using SmartPac from Singpost (trackable).

Each country has different approval times to clear customs. We will send your perks to you as soon as possible for them to reach you ASAP!

Depending on the country you reside in, there may be respective Duty/VAT charges which you will have to bear.
 

Other Ways You Can Help!
Spread the word with perks!

 

All support  to help us reach and stretch past our goal is immensely appreciated.
With Indiegogo's super social functions, you can easily share our campaign with your friends and family!
To reward our super fans, Hello Hachiko is going to give you an extra Notepad set for every referral that results in a contribution!

*Please note that you need to first be a backer of this campaign and you need to be logged onto your Indiegogo account and use Indiegogo's share tools for their analytics to track your referral contributions! *

 

 

WE APPRECIATE AND LOVE ALL YOUR SUPPORT!
PLEASE HELP US MAKE OUR DREAM COME TRUE!

Postage will be added to your perk during checkout and is based on location.For backers outside Singapore, we have chosen to use surface mail to send your lovely perks to you. Although this route will take slightly longer to reach you and does not give the option of tracking, it is definitely more economical.
If you wish to receive your package via air mail (additional charges will apply, tracking available) please do not hesitate to contact us to arrange!For our Singapore backers, we will be using SmartPac from Singpost (trackable).Each country has different approval times to clear customs. We will send your perks to you as soon as possible for them to reach you ASAP!Depending on the country you reside in, there may be respective Duty/VAT charges which you will have to bear. 

Other Ways You Can Help!Spread the word with perks!
 

All support  to help us reach and stretch past our goal is immensely appreciated.With Indiegogo's super social functions, you can easily share our campaign with your friends and family!To reward our super fans, Hello Hachiko is going to give you an extra Notepad set for every referral that results in a contribution!*Please note that you need to first be a backer of this campaign and you need to be logged onto your Indiegogo account and use Indiegogo's share tools for their analytics to track your referral contributions! *
 

 
WE APPRECIATE AND LOVE ALL YOUR SUPPORT!PLEASE HELP US MAKE OUR DREAM COME TRUE!

story:
Contra Mundum Press (CMP) is a New York-based independent publishing house whose publications have been heralded in the pages of The Times Literary Supplement, The New Statesman, The Guardian, the Paris Review, and the Los Angeles Review of Books, amongst others.

Since our inception, we have received recognition and support from the Hungarian Book Foundation, the French Embassy, TEDA (Translation and Publication Grant Program of Turkey), the Austrian Ministry of Education, Arts, & Culture, and the Lois Rothman Foundation. To date, CMP has published translations from Sumerian, French, Hungarian, Italian, German, Farsi, and Turkish, bilingual books, two world premiere editions of texts by Fernando Pessoa, and several multilingual books. Our art journal, Hyperion: On the Future of Aesthetics, has an annual readership of over 125,000 people stretching from the Americas to Europe, Africa, the Middle East and Asia.

CMP is seeking support to pay for the translation rights to world-renowned film actor Gerard Depardieu’s critically acclaimed book Innocent. Depardieu has performed in nearly 200 films since 1967 and needs little to no introduction. He has worked with many of the world’s most acclaimed directors, including Jean-Luc Godard, Bernardo Bertolucci, Marguerite Duras, Bertrand Blier, Alain Resnais, Marco Ferreri, Peter Handke, Francois Truffaut, Andrez Wajda & others. He is the recipient of the César Award for Best Actor (1981; 1991), the Venice Film Festival Award for Best Actor (1985), the Cannes Film Festival Award for Best Actor (1990), a Stanislavsky Award (2006) from the Moscow Film Festival for outstanding achievement in the career of acting, etc. Depardieu is also a Chevalier of the Ordre national du Mérite and a Chevalier of the Légion d’honneur.

In addition to being an actor and entrepreneur, Depardieu is the author of numerous books, including Lettres volées (1988), Vivant! (2004), Ma cuisine (2005), Ça s’est fait comme ça (2014), and Innocent (2015). In his latest book, Depardieu presents fervent reflections on friendship, cinema, religion, politics and more, espousing a notion of innocence that calls us to move beyond dogma and ideology & to engage with others with respect, receptivity, and mindfulness. We believe it a necessary if not vital book for our combative and divisive times.

To lend support to this project is not to stand in absolute agreement with the writer but to engage in a dialogue, to obtain clarity about Depardieu, to gain an intimate and direct view of what he believes, and the conflicts that are polarizing our world.

By contributing to this campaign, you will help CMP publish a total of 10,000 copies of Innocent, the largest print run of a book since our inception, which will be a great achievement in and of itself. If this print run sells out, CMP will print successive runs of 10,000 copies each, which will potentially give the press a strong financial foundation that will enable us to pursue many other projects in the future.

In order to pay for the translation rights to Depardieu’s book, CMP needs to raise $10,500.

Our various perks include:

— a custom made bookmark with a quotation from Innocent;

— a beautifully designed excerpt of Innocent in advance of publication (mini e-book);

— a copy of the actual book one month prior to its release to the general public;

— a coffee mug with an image of Depardieu (drink your morning joe (or wine or whiskey if ya like) out of Depardieu's mug!);

— a t-shirt with a quote from the book & the Contra Mundum logo;

— an original work of calligraphy by CMP's typographer Alessandro Segalini;

— a one-of-a-kind silk-screen conceived by artist Genese Grill;

— a video of recitations from the book; and

— mention of your name prominently featured in the book's colophon.
 

If we don’t reach our entire goal, whatever money is raised will go toward paying a portion of the translation rights.

In this time of political turmoil, religious extremism, and fractured social relations, Depardieu’s Innocent is a vital if not necessary book, which offers socio-political observations and thought provocations about myriad topics ranging from friendship to art to politics, religion, cooking and love. The impact starts with your generous donation, which will enable us to purchase the English translation rights.

The sole risk is simply raising the funds to pay for the translation rights, a hurdle that can be easily overcome with your generous support.

Since its inception five and a half years ago, CMP has published one book every other month and received numerous awards, cultural support, and other recognition, hence the translation, typesetting, and publication of the book presents no challenges.

With the promise of Depardieu's own participation in the book launch both in the US and Paris, the probability of the book's success is considerably high.

While financial support is crucial to our realizing this venture, if you remain interested in it but cannot offer monetary support, there are other ways of helping. The most basic but effective form of support you can give is by sharing this campaign on your social media accounts through the Indiegogo share tools. Raising the visibility of our campaign is valuable in and of itself — please help spread the word.

And if you’re interested in keeping up to date with CMP, follow us on our social media platforms.
@_contramundum_

story:
Short Summary

Peace be upon you. My name is Luqman (Luis Jijon). I am known as Ustadh Luqman Al-Andalusi. 
Over the past few years I have published three books now. 
1) The Virtues of Ali ibn Abi Talib, 2) The Life and Marriage of Fatimah Al-Zahrah, 3) The 100 Jewels of Hadith - 100 Hadith to Memorize. 

I am trying to get more funding to release many others books I have in the works and translations. All the books will be translated into Spanish as well. In Sha' Allah.   

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • Every contributor will have access to my lectures, lessons, books, etc for free.
    The 7,000 is being used to pay the people involved in the making of the book, as well as the printing out of books in general. 
  • I have gone overseas to learn and teach. I can speak Arabic, English and Spanish. Alhamdulillah. This is my life, I take the research of the Prophet's family, peace be upon them all, very serious. This is no joke and I hope that Allah accepts my intentions to please Rasul Allah, Alayhimus Salatu was Salam. 
     

The Impact


The teachings of the Ahlul Bayt, are most valuable to society. For example, Imam Husayn is known as the world's greatest revolutionary, Imam Hasan is known for his charity and his teachings of spirituality. Imam Jafar Al-Sadiq for example, was one of the teachers of many of the great Sunni Imams we all follow to this day. 

One should be able to tell I am very serious, as I spend all of my free times within study, research and the like. Alhamdulillah. As I said, I have successfully already published three works and I hope to release as many or more than Imam Suyuti, Rahimahullah, who is one of my heroes. 
 

Risks & Challenges


The challenges I always have are monetary. Alhamdulillah, I feel good from a spiritual point of view, yet I cannot deny the fact that these funds are needed and that I may get stressed or depressed if I cannot continue this work. May Allah forbid that. Ya Rabb! 
 

Other Ways You Can Help


No worries, if one cannot contribute financially. In Islam we believe that our supplications to Allah are the real wealth. Our good deeds are our real worth, etc. It doesn't mean you cannot help, just because you don't send money. Please remember that. Your Duas are priceless and I thank you for all of them. Allahumma Amin.


I thank you for your time and I hope that Allah blessed us to reach this goal. 

- Ustadh Luqman Al-Andalusi (Luis Jijon)

story:
Ukratko

Strateškom vizijom i kroz ciljano djelovanje nastojimo aktivno učestvovati u kreiranju sopstvene stvarnosti i budućnosti.

  • Mi smo Udruženje SITAN VEZ iz Sarajeva. (www.sitanvez.ba)
  • Sitan vez je nastao kao odgovor na probleme sa kojima se naše društvo suočava: neznanje, pasivnost, manjak samopouzdanja, nedostatak samopoštovanja, i strateška dezorjentiranost. Cilj nam je promovirati i jačati svijesti o sopstvenoj historiji, kulturi, tradiciji, religiji i naciji da bi potakli aktivno učešće u kreiranju sopstvene stvarnosti i budućnosti.

Šta smo kreirali?

Uslijed nedostatka edukativnog materijala namijenjenog našoj maloj raji - našim malenim prijateljima i prijateljicama - Sitan vez je kreirao prvu od ukupno 5 prelijepih bojanki.
Ove bojanke su namijenjene djeci uzrasta od 18 mjeseci do 10 godina. Ideja bojanki je da se prezentuju motivi i scene iz bogate bosanske (bosanskohercegovačke) historije na jednostavan i lijep način. Odabrali smo Zmaja od Bosne, Huseina-kapetana Gradaščevića koji uz pomoć svog zmaja (Zmajki), obilazeći znamenite historijske trenutke, dočarava ljepotu naše bosanske kulture i historije.

Šta nam je potrebno?

  • Novčana podrška za realizaciju ideje.

Koliko novca nam je potrebno?

  • Ukupno 40.000 KM (20.000 EURO ili 25.000 USD).

Kako ćemo utrošiti taj novac?

  • Obzirom da namjeravamo kreirati seriju bojanki za djecu (5 komada ukupno), želimo pokriti  troškove pripreme materijala kao i štampe.

Jedna bojanka košta:

  • Artwork/priprema:  2.000 KM
    • Sadrži 16 scena - profesionalne ilustracije
  • Štampa (tiraž 4500 komada): 5.000 KM
    • Format B4, papir 170g (16 stranica sa perforacijom), naslovnica papir 300g (2 stranice + UV filter)
  • Ukupno:   7.000 KM (1 bojanka)
    • Ovdje ne računamo sate i sate našeg rada u pripremi i uredništvu ovog djela. To radimo iz ljubavi i na volonterskoj osnovi.

Stoga, trošak za 5 bojanki iznosi:  35.000 KM (5 bojanki x 7.000KM)

A šta je sa ostatkom (5.000 KM)?

Planiramo raditi reklamnu kampanju širom BiH da bojanka dođe do što većeg broja ljudi. To će uključivati billboard kampanju kao i reklamnu kampanju putem društvenih mreža.  

 

Cilj

Po našoj procjeni, u Bosni i Hercegovini postoji oko 100.000 djece uzrasta koji su naša ciljna skupina.

Da bi smo to postigli potrebna nam je vaša pomoć u pokrivanju troškova izrade bojanke i štampe, barem u ovom prvom dijelu našeg projekta.

Sitan vez nema želju da zarađuje novac od ove bojanke. Želimo samo da projekat bude samoodrživ u dalekoj budućnosti.
Cilj je da svako dijete u Bosni i Hercegovini koristi ove bojanke. Od sada pa nadalje.

 

Naše udruženje trenutno finansiramo isključivo od ličnih sredstava članova. Da bi smo dostigli naš cilj, potrebna nam je vaša pomoć.

 

Kako još možete pomoći?

Podijelite ovu kampanju i sjajnu priču sa svim vašim prijateljima i prijateljicama! :)
Facebook, Instagram, Email, itd, itd.

story:
Om boken

Bus och Gos bor under sängen i ett barnrum. På dagen sover de, men på nätterna kommer de fram för att busa och gosa. En natt när de vaknar upptäcker de en söt liten dammråtta som springer runt och leker i rummet. Dammråttan Tusse är mycket nyfiken av sig, men inte så försiktig. Bus och Gos måste se till att hen inte väcker det lilla barnet som ligger och sover.

Det är en bok om vänskap och nyfikenhet, som tar med barnet på ett alldeles speciellt äventyr där endast fantasin sätter gränser för vad som kan hända i ett helt vanligt barnrum…

Boken riktar sig till de yngsta läsarna från 0-6 år. Den är lätt för de minsta att ta till sig tack vare det enkla språket och de färgglada bilderna, och bjuder in de lite större till interaktion. Tusse på äventyr blir den första boken i en serie om Bus, Gos och Tusse. Hoppas era barn vill följa med på fler äventyr framöver!

 

Om Tusen förlag

Tänk om det vore möjligt att skapa en positiv förändring i världen, kanske inte idag eller ens imorgon, men längre fram, när våra barn och barnbarn har vuxit upp och tagit över våra roller och världen. Hur vill vi att det ska se ut då? Och vad kan vi göra nu för att påverka det då?

Detta är frågor och funderingar som har format det som nu har blivit Tusen förlag. Ett förlag med ambitionen att sträva efter jämställdhet och likabehandling, gemenskap och inkludering, mångfald och normbrytande. Vi tror på att barnen är vår framtid, och det bästa sättet att skapa långsiktig förändring är genom att skapa för dem. På Tusen förlag strävar vi efter att skapa kunskap och underhållning för barn, för att de i framtiden ska kunna ha mer än en, två eller till och med tusen möjligheter!

 

Bokens bakgrund

Nu står vi inför utgivningen av vår första barnbok, Bus och Gos - Tusse på äventyr, en bok som jag skrev och illustrerade för nästan 10 år sedan när jag gick på gymnasiet. Redan då brann jag för genus och jämställdhetsfrågor och drömde om den dagen då jag själv skulle kunna bidra till en förändring för mitt och alla andra barn. 

Det var under de år som hen-debatten hade börjat få liv och alla hade en åsikt, men jag upptäckte snabbt att många inte riktigt förstod nyttan eller poängen med att använda ett tredje pronomen. Det är lätt att motsätta sig något som man inte förstår, och ordet var ännu inte så utbrett så det var inte helt lätt att visa exempel där ordet kunde vara till nytta. Ytterligare ett problem var att många som förstod nyttan och ville använda ordet kände att det var svårt att vänja sig vid det. 

Då fick jag idén att skriva en barnbok som enbart använder pronomen hen. På så vis kunde barn lära sig ordet från början, samtidigt som vuxna fick en möjlighet att vänja sig vid att säga det i ett avslappnat och kravlöst sammanhang. I den här boken blir det tydligt att ordet öppnar upp för fler möjligheter och att kön inte har så stor betydelse för någons handlingar eller beteende som man tidigare har trott. 

 

Om författaren

Bus och Gos - Tusse på äventyr är skriven och illustrerad av mig själv, Tiara Norlin. Det är även jag som har grundat Tusen Förlag, och det är främst tack vare denna bok. Jag visste från början att jag ville ge ut boken och var beredd på att det skulle vara svårt att få ut den på ett etablerat förlag, så jag beslutade mig tidigt för att egenutgivning skulle passa mig. Ju mer jag lärde mig om litteraturbranschen och utgivningsprocessen kände jag att jag skulle kunna göra så mycket mer än att bara ge ut en egen bok. Så började idén om ett helt nytt bokförlag för barnböcker som erbjuder mångfald och igenkänning för fler barn. Bus och Gos - Tusse på äventyr kommer alltså vara startskottet för Tusen Förlag, och boken kommer att efterföljas av verk från flera författare och illustratörer utöver mig själv. 

Jag har alltid varit intresserad av bild, animation och storytelling. Innan jag bestämde mig för att rikta in mig på litteratur studerade jag animation och digital bildproduktion på både gymnasie- och högskolenivå. Slutligen tog jag en yrkesexamen i Motion Creative på Hyper Island. Sedan jag startade förlaget har jag även studerat många kurser i barnlitteratur. För varje bok jag läser blir jag mer och mer kär i barnboksvärlden - och läser, det gör jag mycket! Främst tillsammans med min dotter som är min största inspiration i såväl skapandet som i min vilja att förändra världen.

När jag inte arbetar med bokutgivning håller jag gärna till i danssalen, och när jag inte orkar dansa mer sitter jag troligtvis i soffan med familjen och tittar på spännande fantasyserier och klassiska disneyfilmer. 

 

Om kampanjen

Efter flera års väntan och en ordentlig omarbetning av både bild och text är jag nu redo att dela boken med er. För att det ska vara möjligt behöver jag DIN hjälp. Utgivningen kommer att kosta runt 35 000 kr med tryck och övriga nödvändiga utgifter. Tack vare Karlskrona Kommuns Kultur- och fritidsnämnd har jag tilldelats 15 000 kr till bokens utgivning, men denna summa räcker enbart till tryck för en liten upplaga. 

Jag startade Tusen förlag med syfte att öka mångfald och jämställdhet i barnlitteraturen. Målet är att det ska vara lätt för alla att hitta böcker som kan tilltala fler och bredare målgrupper, och detta vill jag bidra till genom att göra böckerna lättillgängliga. En större upplaga ökar chansen att boken lättare kan hittas i flera av landets bibliotek och bokhandlar.

Genom att bidra med en summa eller förbeställa ditt exemplar genom denna kampanj är du med och gör skillnad för ett bredare och mer inkluderande utbud av böcker för alla barn i Sverige!

 

Perks

I listan till höger hittar du olika sätt att bidra.

Du kan förbeställa en bok för 100 kr, eller två böcker för 180 kr, givetvis signerade av författaren. Du kan till exempel köpa boken både till dig själv och till en vän, passar perfekt som julklapp!

Låt barnens kreativitet och fantasi flöda fritt med en digital målarbok som ni kan skriva ut. Målarboken skickas på mail i pdf-format i samband med bokutgivningen. Målarboken kan endast beställas tillsammans med ett av ovanstående perks som en add-on för 50 kr.

Om du inte vill köpa boken kan du istället välja att bidra med en valfri summa. 

 

Utgivning

Boken är planerad att gå till tryck i början av november 2020, vilket innebär att utgivningen kommer att ske senast i början av december. Vi arbetar aktivt för att ni som förbeställer boken här ska hinna få hem den före julafton! Boken kommer att tryckas hos Print in Baltic i Litauen i formatet 17x17 cm.

Upplagans storlek beror helt och hållet på och anpassas efter denna kampanj. Vi kommer dock garanterat att trycka minst 500 böcker, men målet är att vi ska kunna trycka dubbelt så många så att vi får större chanser att nå ut till fler.

 

Risker och utmaningar

Tusen Förlag är ett litet och nystartat förlag, och denna bok kommer att vara den första som ges ut på förlaget. Jag startade företaget redan år 2017 och har sedan dess utbildat mig och arbetat hårt med att lära mig så mycket som möjligt om företagande och bokutgivning. Det är viktigt för mig att utgivningen genomförs med samma standard och kvalitet som på vilket annat större förlag som helst. Av denna anledning har jag varit noga med att inte ge ut boken innan jag känner mig helt säker på att alla nödvändiga steg kommer att utföras på bästa möjliga sätt. 

Om vi inte når det mål vi har satt för denna kampanjen kommer de insamlade pengarna ändå att gå till att trycka en så stor upplaga som möjligt. Därmed kan vi garantera att de böcker som förbeställs här kommer att produceras inom den satta tidsramen.

Skulle vi samla in mer än det mål vi har satt går allt överskott till Tusen Förlag för att finansiera ytterligare upplagor av samma bok och/eller till framtida utgivningar på förlaget.

Under denna kampanj och fram till och med utgivningen kommer vi att arbeta öppet med många uppdateringar både här på kampanjsidan samt på vår hemsida och digitala medier. Länkar till dessa hittar du i presentationen längst upp på sidan.

 

Andra sätt att hjälpa till

Dela gärna kampanjen i sociala medier så vi når ut till fler!

Du kan även tipsa ditt bibliotek eller din bokhandel om Bus och Gos - Tusse på äventyr. De kommer att kunna beställa den via BokInfo.

 

Tusen tack!
story_txt: Om bokenBus och Gos bor under sängen i ett barnrum. På dagen sover de, men på nätterna kommer de fram för att busa och gosa. En natt när de vaknar upptäcker de en söt liten dammråtta som springer runt och leker i rummet. Dammråttan Tusse är mycket nyfiken av sig, men inte så försiktig. Bus och Gos måste se till att hen inte väcker det lilla barnet som ligger och sover.Det är en bok om vänskap och nyfikenhet, som tar med barnet på ett alldeles speciellt äventyr där endast fantasin sätter gränser för vad som kan hända i ett helt vanligt barnrum…Boken riktar sig till de yngsta läsarna från 0-6 år. Den är lätt för de minsta att ta till sig tack vare det enkla språket och de färgglada bilderna, och bjuder in de lite större till interaktion. Tusse på äventyr blir den första boken i en serie om Bus, Gos och Tusse. Hoppas era barn vill följa med på fler äventyr framöver! Om Tusen förlagTänk om det vore möjligt att skapa en positiv förändring i världen, kanske inte idag eller ens imorgon, men längre fram, när våra barn och barnbarn har vuxit upp och tagit över våra roller och världen. Hur vill vi att det ska se ut då? Och vad kan vi göra nu för att påverka det då?Detta är frågor och funderingar som har format det som nu har blivit Tusen förlag. Ett förlag med ambitionen att sträva efter jämställdhet och likabehandling, gemenskap och inkludering, mångfald och normbrytande. Vi tror på att barnen är vår framtid, och det bästa sättet att skapa långsiktig förändring är genom att skapa för dem. På Tusen förlag strävar vi efter att skapa kunskap och underhållning för barn, för att de i framtiden ska kunna ha mer än en, två eller till och med tusen möjligheter! Bokens bakgrundNu står vi inför utgivningen av vår första barnbok, Bus och Gos - Tusse på äventyr, en bok som jag skrev och illustrerade för nästan 10 år sedan när jag gick på gymnasiet. Redan då brann jag för genus och jämställdhetsfrågor och drömde om den dagen då jag själv skulle kunna bidra till en förändring för mitt och alla andra barn. Det var under de år som hen-debatten hade börjat få liv och alla hade en åsikt, men jag upptäckte snabbt att många inte riktigt förstod nyttan eller poängen med att använda ett tredje pronomen. Det är lätt att motsätta sig något som man inte förstår, och ordet var ännu inte så utbrett så det var inte helt lätt att visa exempel där ordet kunde vara till nytta. Ytterligare ett problem var att många som förstod nyttan och ville använda ordet kände att det var svårt att vänja sig vid det. Då fick jag idén att skriva en barnbok som enbart använder pronomen hen. På så vis kunde barn lära sig ordet från början, samtidigt som vuxna fick en möjlighet att vänja sig vid att säga det i ett avslappnat och kravlöst sammanhang. I den här boken blir det tydligt att ordet öppnar upp för fler möjligheter och att kön inte har så stor betydelse för någons handlingar eller beteende som man tidigare har trott.  Om författarenBus och Gos - Tusse på äventyr är skriven och illustrerad av mig själv, Tiara Norlin. story:
Short Summary

A lot happened in the 1,461 days of the presidency of Donald J. Trump. So much that no one could possibly retain it all. Working off the whirlwind mantra of “flood the zone,” Trump kept fans and critics alike mesmerized by his daily gyrations and machinations, aiming to “own the news cycle” like no previous president. 

But in the process what was done and what was missed often leaving a nation to wonder what just happened. This solves for that in a volume that will be a vital historical reference for many years to come.

Days of Trump is the first book to chronicle, and capture a detailed look back at all the significant events and headlines of the Trump era and for the first time put it all together in one place, giving the reader and historians the chance to better see how these myriad events all fit into place and where we are left as a nation.

What We Need & What You Get

The hard part is done! We have already put together four years of  research and content. Now, in order to publish and market the book, we are looking to raise an initial round of $10,000. 

We are offering a unique array of prizes and bonus offers depending on your contribution level.

Be a part of history on a story that must be told!

Other Ways You Can Help

This is an important record of a most unusual time in our nation's history. Help get the word out with all the shared tools that Indie GoGo provides for you here. 

FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/DAYSofTRUMPbook/

TWITTER: https://twitter.com/DAYSofTRUMP1

INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/daysoftrump/

YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fgRx4k5Bvyg  

​And share our link here: 

INDIE GOGO: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/days-of-trum...
